    • Method Detail

      • getWalLoggingRate

        public float getWalLoggingRate()
        Gets the average number of WAL records per second written during the last time interval.

        The length of time interval is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsRateTimeInterval(long) configuration property. The number of subintervals is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsSubIntervalCount(int) configuration property.

        Specified by:
        getWalLoggingRate in interface DataStorageMetrics
        Specified by:
        getWalLoggingRate in interface DataStorageMetricsMXBean

      • getWalWritingRate

        public float getWalWritingRate()
        Gets the average number of bytes per second written during the last time interval. The length of time interval is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsRateTimeInterval(long) configuration property. The number of subintervals is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsSubIntervalCount(int) configuration property.
        Specified by:
        getWalWritingRate in interface DataStorageMetrics
        Specified by:
        getWalWritingRate in interface DataStorageMetricsMXBean

      • getWalArchiveSegments

        public int getWalArchiveSegments()
        Gets the current number of WAL segments in the WAL archive.
        Specified by:
        getWalArchiveSegments in interface DataStorageMetrics
        Specified by:
        getWalArchiveSegments in interface DataStorageMetricsMXBean

      • getWalFsyncTimeAverage

        public float getWalFsyncTimeAverage()
        Gets the average WAL fsync duration in microseconds over the last time interval.

        The length of time interval is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsRateTimeInterval(long) configuration property. The number of subintervals is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsSubIntervalCount(int) configuration property.

        Specified by:
        getWalFsyncTimeAverage in interface DataStorageMetrics
        Specified by:
        getWalFsyncTimeAverage in interface DataStorageMetricsMXBean

      • getWalBuffPollSpinsRate

        public long getWalBuffPollSpinsRate()
        Returns WAL buffer poll spins number over the last time interval.

        The length of time interval is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsRateTimeInterval(long) configuration property. The number of subintervals is configured via DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsSubIntervalCount(int) configuration property.

        Specified by:
        getWalBuffPollSpinsRate in interface DataStorageMetrics
        Specified by:
        getWalBuffPollSpinsRate in interface DataStorageMetricsMXBean

      • rateTimeInterval

        public void rateTimeInterval(long rateTimeInterval)
        Sets time interval for rate-based metrics. Identical to setting DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsRateTimeInterval(long) configuration property.
        Specified by:
        rateTimeInterval in interface DataStorageMetricsMXBean
        Parameters:
        rateTimeInterval - Time interval (in milliseconds) used for allocation and eviction rates calculations.

      • subIntervals

        public void subIntervals(int subInts)
        Sets a number of sub-intervals the whole DataStorageMetricsMXBean.rateTimeInterval(long) will be split into to calculate rate-based metrics. Identical to setting DataStorageConfiguration.setMetricsSubIntervalCount(int) configuration property.
        Specified by:
        subIntervals in interface DataStorageMetricsMXBean
        Parameters:
        subInts - A number of sub-intervals.

      • onCheckpoint

        public void onCheckpoint(long lockWaitDuration,
                         long markDuration,
                         long pagesWriteDuration,
                         long fsyncDuration,
                         long duration,
                         long totalPages,
                         long dataPages,
                         long cowPages)
        Parameters:
        lockWaitDuration - Lock wait duration.
        markDuration - Mark duration.
        pagesWriteDuration - Pages write duration.
        fsyncDuration - Total checkpoint fsync duration.
        duration - Total checkpoint duration.
        totalPages - Total number of all pages in checkpoint.
        dataPages - Total number of data pages in checkpoint.
        cowPages - Total number of COW-ed pages in checkpoint.
